title: jaehong.park
author: jaehong.park
content: BTCGPT predicts the price of Bitcoin.It's just for fun, so don't take it too seriously or rely on it for investing decisions.Check it out if you're curious!https://btcgpt.info

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: jaehong.park on April 14, 2023, 01:03:44 AMIt's just for fun, so don't take it too seriously or rely on it for investing decisions.I checked the site and I saw exactly what you said.QuoteBTCGPTðŸš€ðŸŒ•BTCGPT predicts the price of Bitcoin.It's just for fun, so don't take it too seriously or rely on it for investing decisions.This site does not recommend any investment and all risks arising from the use of information on this site are the responsibility of the investor.As a trader, any single mistake is money loss, we discuss what is serious and related to money on trading discussion board, not guess work.You can move this to speculation.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: jaehong.park on April 14, 2023, 01:03:44 AMhttps://btcgpt.infoAre you the main developer or you are just found it because I sent you a message on Reddit.I have a few points on website design:Simplify the interface: There are a lot of modern and eye-catching templates.Forecast, Price and Accuracy Chart: Display a chart showing the difference between the real price and the price that was predicted in the past and then show the percentage of accuracy across certain averages.There is no need for many additional details.Quote from: Oshosondy on April 14, 2023, 10:30:47 AMYou can move this to speculation.The results chart can be moved but I don't know about this topic, maybe Project Development.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: jaehong.park on April 14, 2023, 01:03:44 AMBTCGPT predicts the price of Bitcoin.It's just for fun, so don't take it too seriously or rely on it for investing decisions.Check it out if you're curious!https://btcgpt.infoIt looks like you created this platform, am I right? What is your purpose and you posted it here in the forum? Are you trying this website you provided?From what I can see, if these predictions that are posted on this website happen, many communities here will likely rely on the predictions that you will post on this platform.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Your tactic of promoting that website is quite awesome. Â  But, if you made that site just for fun then why are you promoting it in this reputed forum? Why not on social media groups as they are too nice for such funsÂ  related sites and they admire such things. However, if your program can generate something useful that might be profitable for short term, but what will be the situation when innocent people trust the predictions of the program and invest their money according to the generated predications, who will be responsible for their loss?These types of programs are experimental and I would alert every trader to do enough research before putting their hard earned money on such predictions. I'm not against the idea of OP, but it might cause more damage than good to newbie traders. And, nobody serious enough about trading would promote such a thing.

comments.author: so98nn
comments.body: Thatâ€™s really cool Website. I donâ€™t know why but that should have be real Website. It does look very real and if you wouldnâ€™t had that note then Iâ€™m sure someone might have fallen for the trap.Â  Good to see that have been coded to such good detail. I gotta ask though what Ha the purpose of having such site except for fun. I mean I can watch it once or twice may be but third visit would be just casual one. I think slowly you can turn this site into a prediction game. Like what would be price tomorrow and distribute XY price from the pot. Itâ€™s about your imagination and willingness to do it. Good luck dude.

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: Is this your website? Have you made it? This is very cool. I've just checked it and it predicted the future of bitcoin, but I am curious on how it predicted it. Like, is there open-source code on this so that we can see what the algorithm is and how it works? Though I know that we don't take it seriously, I am amazed at how much the probability of winning this is. If you bought yesterday and sold today, how much is your profit? I also want to see tables like in the BTC history on the website (I know we can check it on other websites, but it is better to see it on that website).

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: jaehong.park on April 14, 2023, 01:03:44 AMIt's just for fun, so don't take it too seriously or rely on it for investing decisions. You're right don't take this prediction seriously.Nothing cool when realizing that this domain was just created 10 days ago. Quote9 days oldCreated on 2023-04-10Expires on 2026-04-10Updated on 2023-04-15https://whois.domaintools.com/btcgpt.infoThe question is, how magically does the past prediction before April 10 appear (if it is assumed that you completed the site at the same time as purchasing the domain)?

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Is this your siteÂ   if it just for fun that is fine by me. Just dont talk to other if someday that the prediction have 100% accurate because using some an "AI" predictionBecause some people will trust and ending up losing money if you talk like that

comments.author: FUCKBSVFUCK
